question: Who has been appointed the new Solicitor General of India?
explanation: Senior Advocate Tushar Mehta has been appointed as Solicitor General of India (SGI). He will remain in office till 30th of June, 2020 or till further orders. Mr Mehta is currently serving as the Additional Solicitor General.  The post of Solicitor General was vacant since October last year after the resignation of Ranjit Kumar.
